title: John Heitinga - Wikipedia
snippet: He helped the Dutch to the World Cup final in 2010, in which he was sent off in a loss to Spain. In 2008, he was named Dutch Footballer of the Year. Heitinga was born in Alphen aan den Rijn, South Holland, and raised in Amsterdam.

title: John Heitinga: Age, Net Worth, Family & Career Highlights - Mabumbe
snippet: Born on November 15, 1983, in Alphen aan den Rijn, Netherlands, Heitinga’s career spanned top European clubs and the Dutch national team. Post-retirement, he transitioned into coaching, bringing his wealth of experience to the sidelines.

title: John Heitinga Biography, Career Info, Records & Achievements
snippet: Hailing from Netherlands, John Heitinga was born on 15th November 1983 in Alphen aan den Rijn. Nicknamed as Johnny, is a Dutch football coach and a former professional football player who played as a centre back. Currently he is the manager of the Under-19 squad of Ajax.
